summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of Donovan L. Gay. The documents primarily consist of payroll records and related forms for various staff members of the U.S. House of Representatives Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). These records include payroll certifications, payroll authorization forms, final determination notifications regarding the postponement of Social Security numbers, and other employment-related documents. The documents focus on administrative aspects of the HSCA's operations and the privacy concerns related to staff information.
significance: Based on the provided documents, Donovan L. Gay has no significance in the JFK context.
